mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, pwd, user_sex, email, role, dept_id, super_admin, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete from community_user where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into community_user(user_name, pwd, user_sex, email, role, dept_id, super_admin, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete) values (#{userName}, #{pwd}, #{userSex}, #{email}, #{role}, #{deptId}, #{superAdmin}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{delete})

insert into community_user(user_name, pwd, user_sex, email, role, dept_id, super_admin, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.pwd}, #{entity.userSex}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.role}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.superAdmin}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.delete})

insert into community_user(user_name, pwd, user_sex, email, role, dept_id, super_admin, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.pwd}, #{entity.userSex}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.role}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.superAdmin}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.delete})
on duplicate key update user_name = values(user_name), pwd = values(pwd), user_sex = values(user_sex), email = values(email), role = values(role), dept_id = values(dept_id), super_admin = values(super_admin), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), create_user = values(create_user), update_user = values(update_user), delete = values(delete)
mapper.update:
update community_user
user_name = #{userName},
pwd = #{pwd},
user_sex = #{userSex},
email = #{email},
role = #{role},
dept_id = #{deptId},
super_admin = #{superAdmin},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_user = #{updateUser},
delete = #{delete},
where user_id = #{userId}
